    • Method Detail

      • setCacheSize

        void setCacheSize(double size)
        Sets the size of cache memory for learning.
        Parameters:
        size - the size of cache memory [MB]. This value is at least 30.0 [MB] if the size is less than 30.0 [MB].

      • setDegree

        void setDegree(int degree)
        Sets the parameter 'degree' of polynomial kernel functions.
        Parameters:
        degree - the degree of polynomial kernel functions.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the degree is less than 1.

      • setGamma

        void setGamma(double gamma)
        Sets the parameter 'gamma' of kernel functions.
        Parameters:
        gamma - the parameter gamma

        void setEpsilon(double e)
        Sets the parameter 'Epsilon' for the threshold of convergence.
        Parameters:
        e - epsilon

      • setKernelType

        void setKernelType(Parameters.KernelType type)
        Sets the type of kernel functions.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of kernel functions: {LINEAR, POLYNOMIAL, RBF, SIGMOID} is available, otherwise throw IllegalArgumentException.
